attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2009-0630

Date: 2009-04-23

Whereas the Tracadie Board of Trade, in the Province of New Brunswick, the certificate of formation of which was recorded pursuant to the Boards of Trade Act on March 10, 1923, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, hereby dissolves as a corporation the Tracadie Board of Trade.


Attendu que la Tracadie Board of Trade (Nouveau-Brunswick), dont le certificat de constitution a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 10 mars 1923, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil dissout la Tracadie Board of Trade.
attachmentText:
PC Number: 2009-0630Date: 2009-04-23


Whereas the Tracadie Board of Trade, in the Province of New Brunswick, the certificate of formation of which was recorded pursuant to the Boards of Trade Act on March 10, 1923, has ceased to exercise its franchises;


 


Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, hereby dissolves as a corporation the Tracadie Board of Trade.



Attendu que la Tracadie Board of Trade (Nouveau-Brunswick), dont le certificat de constitution a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 10 mars 1923, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,


 


À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil dissout la Tracadie Board of Trade.
